summary: Designed promotional visuals including social media posts, banners, and email creatives for the salon & spa discovery platform.
Collaborated with marketing, product, and tech teams to develop campaigns aligned with brand identity.
Edited and retouched images for both digital and print media to ensure high-quality, on-brand visuals.
Maintained visual asset libraries and followed brand guidelines to ensure consistency across platforms.
Contributed to improving design systems and overall brand consistency.
Created marketing materials, posters, and social media graphics aligned with brand guidelines.
Collaborated with the design team to develop visual concepts and campaign layouts.
Designed UI/UX wireframes and web assets to improve user experience.
Edited and enhanced images for digital and print platforms.
Participated in brainstorming sessions and contributed creative ideas.
